AppInfo.Slogan: No more popups out of nowhere!

BuyMeACoffee.LabelText: If you like this app and would like to show your appreciation, feel free to ...

AboutPage.InstructionsLabelText:
Browser: At the top of the page, select a website from the picker and start browsing.

About: At the top of the page, click 'Options' to manage the available websites and other user settings or click 'Settings' to manage the app installation and permissions. Close and reopen the app to load your customized websites.
